titleStmt.title: Saint George for England, allegorically described: by Gerrard De Malynes merchant
titleStmt.author: Malynes, Gerard, fl. 1586-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Field for William Tymme stationer, and are to be sold at the signe of the Floure de luce and Crowne in Pater-noster row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Floure de luce
